Heart of stone

2023 | 2h 13m | Action

An intelligence operative for a shadowy global peacekeeping agency races to stop a hacker from stealing its most valuable — and dangerous — weapon.

Starring: Gal Gadot,Jamie Dornan,Alia Bhatt

Watch all you want.

Heart of Stone | Gal Gadot | Official Trailer | Netflix

Gal Gadot is Agent Rachel Stone, the only intelligence operative who stands between her global, peace-keeping organization and the loss of its most valuable — and dangerous — asset, codenamed: The Heart.

Heart of Stone | Gal Gadot | Final Look | Netflix

HEART OF STONE is “rip-roaring action” and “adrenaline-fueled espionage with twists and turns.” Don’t miss Gal Gadot as Agent Rachel Stone, “one of the most exciting action heroes of our time,” along with Jamie Dornan, Matthias Schweighöfer, and Alia Bhatt in HEART OF STONE. Only on Netflix August 11.
